strategy: Necron armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Necron Navy formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Necrons of the Maynarkh Dynasty

formations.name: 0–1 Necron Tomb Complex
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Necron player's half of the table with a Tomb Complex, this counts as an objective marker and a Necron Portal. It may not be destroyed. Formations using the Portal should measure from the centre of the objective.

formations.name: Necron Phalanx
formations.units: Six Necron Warriors and one Necron Lord
extraUnits: Add up to three Tomb Spyders: 50 points each
Add up to two Wraiths: 25 points each

sections.name: Maynarkh Dynasty Portal Formations
sections.description: Up to one for each Necron Phalanx

formations.name: Monolith Phalanx
extraUnits: Add up to one Obelisk: 50 points

formations.name: Monolith Maniple
extraUnits: Add up to one Obelisk: 50 points

sections.name: Maynarkh Dynasty Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two for each Necron Phalanx. A Necron army must contain at least one 'The Unbidden' formation.

formations.name: Destroyer Phalanx
formations.units: Any six of the following units: Destroyers, Heavy Destroyers
extraUnits: Replace one Destroyer with a Necron Destroyer Lord: 25 points
Add up to three Tomb Spyders: 50 points each
Replace up to three Destroyers with Wraiths: Free

formations.name: Stalker Maniple
extraUnits: Replace up to two Triarch Stalkers with Seraptek Heavy Constructs: 75 points each

sections.name: Maynarkh Dynasty Harvesters and Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Megalith Conduit
extraUnits: Add up to two Obelisks (50 points each) and/or Monoliths (75 points each)

formations.name: 0–1 Harvester Engine
formations.units: Either an Æonic Orb or an Abbatoir

upgrades.title: Maynarkh Dynasty Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Overlord
items.description: Either replace one Necron Lord with a Necron Overlord, or replace a Necron Destroyer Lord with a Necron Destroyer Overlord

items.name: 0-1 C'tan Shard
items.description: Add one C'tan Shard to the formation
